A: Choose the best answer for each question.
1. The government wanted to count the number of people in _ (a) Egypt (b) Israel (c) Rome)
2. Mary became pregnant through the _ Spirit (a) Holy (b) Evil (c) Good)
3. Joseph took Mary to his hometown, which was _ (a) Nazareth (b) Jerusalem (c) Bethlehem)
4. There was no more room in the _ when Mary was to give birth (a) house (b) inn (c) temple)
5. Mary gave birth to Jesus Christ in a _ (a) house (b) manger (c) stable)
6. King _ was furious when he heard about the birth of the savior (a) David (b) Herod (c) Solomon)
7. God told Joseph to take baby Jesus and his mother to _ (a) Syria (b) Egypt (c) Rome)
8. Jesus came to the world to save us from _ (a) sickness (b) Satan (c) poverty)
9. Jesus died for our _ (a) joy (b) sins (c) peace)
10. When little children were brought to Jesus, he laid his hand on them and _ for them (a) played (b) prayed (c) sang)
11. Jesus carried the little children on his _ (a) back (b) lap (c) shoulders)
12. Jesus calls his disciples his _ (a) servants (b) friends (c) followers)
13. Which of these is a disciple of Jesus (a) Paul (b) Peter (c) Barnabas)
14. Jesus was crucified on the _ (a) tree (b) cross (c) mountain)
15. Jesus was crucified at the _ hour of the day (a) first (b) third (c) sixth)
16. After his death, a man called Joseph of _ asked for Jesus' body (a) Galilee (b) Arimathea (c) Nazareth)
17. Joseph wrapped Jesus' body and put him in a _ (a) cave (b) tomb (c) house)
18. On the _ day Jesus risen from the death (a) first (b) second (c) third)
19. A Christian is someone who believes in Jesus and follows Him as his or her personal Lord and _ (a) Teacher (b) Saviour (c) King)
20. One step to become a Christian is to be baptized in the name of the Father, the Son, and the _ Spirit (a) Good (b) Holy (c) True)
B: Answer the following questions with a short phrase.
1. Mary became pregnant through the _________ Spirit.
2. Joseph took Mary to _________ to be counted.
3. What was the name of the king who wanted to kill baby Jesus?
4. To what country did God tell Joseph to take Jesus and Mary for protection?
5. What did Jesus call his disciples?
C: Provide a brief answer for each question.
1. Where did Mary give birth to Jesus?
2. Why did Jesus come to the world?
3. What did Jesus do when little children were brought to him?
4. Who asked Pilate for the body of Jesus after His death?
5. What are the three steps to become a Christian?
answers_C: He laid his hand on them, prayed for them, and carried them
Accept Jesus' message, confess sins, be baptized
